00009 import ScheatorDb.*;
00010 import javax.swing.ComboBoxModel;
00011 import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
00012 import java.util.Iterator;
00013 
00022 public abstract class ScheatorComboBoxModel extends AbstractListModel implements ComboBoxModel {
00023     DbObject provider;
00024     LinkedHashMap<Integer, DbObject.Data> list;
00025     DbObject.Data selection = null;
00026 
00036     public Object getElementAt(int index) {
00037         DbObject.Data retval = null;
00038         int i = 0;
00039         for(Iterator it=list.values().iterator(); it.hasNext();) {
00040             if (i == index) {
00041                 retval = (DbObject.Data) it.next();
00042                 break;
00043             }
00044             i++;
00045         }
00046         return retval;
00047     }
00048 
00053     public int getSize() {
00054         return list.size();
00055     }
00056 
00061     public void setSelectedItem(Object anItem) {
00062         selection =  (DbObject.Data) anItem;
00063 
00064     }
00065 
00070     public Object getSelectedItem() {
00071         return selection;
00072     }
